description: Flickering soft light illuminates the chamber with a solemn glow, and lanterns
cast a shadowed protector across the walls. On the back of the room the crest
of the Guardians is displayed, forged from the tears of the Goddess Celestia.
Exquisitely scrolled chestnut furniture embellishes the atmosphere, while instruments
from the far reaches of the realms are mounted about the walls.  Vast amounts of
paperwork are heaped in orderly piles on a desk that identifies the Order's desk.
20154.name: {BThe {!Cr{1im{!so{1n {BGu{bar{*di{ban {BOffice{x

description: About a league into the forest, behind the Guardian Stronghold, is a
enclosed grove.  Twisted about, ancient trees stretch up to form a oaken
dome that creates a hallowed sylvan scape.  A minute amount of light
penetrates the canopy to illuminate the standing stones strategically place
in a circular pattern.  Within the archways of the monoliths, air ripples
due to a breach of reality that links to another part of the world.
{!North: {BMuseum of Creatures{x
{MEast:  {BDrakyri Isle{x
{mWest:  {MM{magitek {MF{mactory{x
{YUp:    {yDuergar
{yDown:  {bZozo{x
20153.name: {!Cr{1im{!so{1n {BGu{bar{*di{ban {BPortal Room 2{x

description: Ceiling beams crisscross in a octagonal enigmatic pattern signifying the
triad of Oghma's brethren.  The stone floor mimics the heaven of the
majestic room, but takes on a more mobious relief.  Armored suits line the
wall, and seem to watch with a knowing glance.
20151.name: Crimson Guardians Entrance Room

description: Artifacts of the Netheral age are scattered about the room in an orderly
fashion.  Wands, potions, and jewelry are placed behind wards of protection
that pulsate a strong aura.  Toward the center of the enclave is a sunken
pit for common use.  Relics from all over the land can be found within, as
well as a chest of assigned equipment for Guardian members.
20152.name: Donation Room

description: Vesper laden stones create the ancient archways which mark the entrance to
the main chamber.  On either side of the portal, granite holders burn
incense with a taunt vaporous stream arcing toward the muraled ceiling.
Long ceremonial candles line the back wall collecting into a mass array of
candelabras, and chanting is heard in the distance.  Vivid tapestries of
forgotten lore are placed between the stained glass windows, and at the
center of the grand hall lays the Guardian's stone council table.
20150.name: {BThe {!Cr{1im{!so{1n {BGu{bar{*di{ban {BClan Room{x

description:
Taliesin, a bard of great prestige, has traveled the world singing his tales 
for all to hear. He carries with him novelties and artifacts plucked from the 
farthest reaches of Faerun. The great dreamer brings forth gifts of the Tylwth 
Teg, the Fair Folk.
20152.room_name: Taliesin the wandering bard, is selling relics from the realms
20152.name: Taliesin~

description:
After the defeat of Maeve's armies she had a powerful enchantress 
cast an evil spell over the Ulstermen. She then had her armies attack 
King Conor's domain. cuChulainn was the only one not affected, and he 
stood his ground against her armies to buy the kingdom time.
20153.room_name: Queen Maeve, the deceptive and greedy woman, is cackling here.
20153.name: Queen Maeve~

description:
A wiry build young man with an au empowering stature.  This is non-other  
than the mighty cuChulainn, who single handily protected the city of
Ulaidh.
20150.name: cuChulainn~

description: Type 'heal' to see a listing of spells.
20151.room_name: Maxell is here, ready to help on request.
20151.name: Maxell~
subroutines:
M ACT 20150 sits down at the stone table~
M SPEECH 20152 first~
M SPEECH 20153 second~
M SPEECH 20154 third~
M SPEECH 20155 fourth~
M SPEECH 20151 yes~
